name: uilicious-cli
author: Uilicious Private Limited
//-bin: bin maps the command line name to the respective script file
//-cpu-os: Ensuring that package is deployed only on compatible platforms
//-engines: Ensure NPM version is atleast 5.6.0 (so that optionalDependencies, with OS/CPU restriction is supported)
//-optionalDependencies: I wanted to use this, directly, but the global flag does not pass over
//-scripts-preinstall: so i use postinstall to copy data out - its binary copy to ensure the files remain soft linked
